2D6-12TH AVENUE. SOUTH

PHONE 254-6473
COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS
January 6, 1966
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Sirs:
Would you please send us as soon as possible any available
INFORMATION WHICH YOU MAY HAVE CONCERNING MEMBERSHIP IN THE
National Association of Educational Broadcasters.
Please send this information to the attention of:
Mr. James J. Howell
Allied Sound Company, Inc.
206-12th Avenue, South
Nashville, Tennessee
Yours truly.
/s
(Miss) Patsy Duncan
Allied Sound Company, Inc.
